snippet.title: Caveblazers Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/452060

Caveblazers is an action focused platformer roguelike set in a fantasy world. Early Access is planned for April 1st 2016.

Each game is unique with procedurally generated levels to explore, and a massive amount of items, weapons and equipment. 
The game takes place in a recently discovered cave, said to hold "unimaginable power". You play as an adventurer setting out to explore the cave and find out what riches it holds, however you are not the only one. 

As you delve deeper in to the cave, you'll discover new areas to explore, new weapons and new monsters to try them out on.

Website: http://www.caveblazers.com
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/caveblazers
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RupeckGames
